mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into agents (agent_code, types, company_name, business_license, tax_registered_no, name, card_id, phone, email, customer_id, address, form_types, parent_id, status, is_have_profit, created_at, updated_at, code, card_id_photo_path, license_no_pic_path, tax_no_pic_path, default_profit) values (#{agentCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{types,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxRegisteredNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formTypes,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{isHaveProfit,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardIdPhotoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licenseNoPicPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxNoPicPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defaultProfit,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update agents set agent_code = #{agentCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, types = #{types,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_license = #{businessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tax_registered_no = #{taxRegisteredNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, form_types = #{formTypes,jdbcType=TINYINT}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_have_profit = #{isHaveProfit,jdbcType=BIT}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card_id_photo_path = #{cardIdPhotoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, license_no_pic_path = #{licenseNoPicPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tax_no_pic_path = #{taxNoPicPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, default_profit = #{defaultProfit,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, agent_code, types, company_name, business_license, tax_registered_no, name, card_id, phone, email, customer_id, address, form_types, parent_id, status, is_have_profit, created_at, updated_at, code, card_id_photo_path, license_no_pic_path, tax_no_pic_path, default_profit from agents where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, agent_code, types, company_name, business_license, tax_registered_no, name, card_id, phone, email, customer_id, address, form_types, parent_id, status, is_have_profit, created_at, updated_at, code, card_id_photo_path, license_no_pic_path, tax_no_pic_path, default_profit from agents
SELECT count(*) as count FROM agents

select * from agents
order by created_at desc limit #{pageRequest.offset}, #{pageRequest.pageSize}
select max(code) from agents where parent_id=0
